alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 6:55PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A line of thunderstorms will impact portions of Yavapai County near Crown King, heading towards Interstate 17 from Black Canyon City to Cordes Junction through 730 PM MST... At 649 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms near Crown King, or 25 miles northwest of New River, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rain and snow, and lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. The heavy rain and snow will reduce visibility and create hazardous travel conditions, especially on Interstate 17. Locations impacted include... Cordes Junction, Bumble Bee, Cordes Lakes, Crown King, Black Canyon City, Rock Springs, Cordes, Turney Gulch Group Campground and Hazlett Hollow Campground. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 242 and 264. State Route 69 between mile markers 263 and 264. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If driving, remember, wipers on lights on and make sure to drive slow with caution. Pull over with your hazard lights on if needed.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
